S04bsu062_u:317_11: bāhyā bhāvāḥ sadā tadvacchakyā vārayituṃ na hi /
S04bsu062_u:317_16: anyacittena mandeana vṛthaiva sidhyate na hi //
S04bsu062_u:317_17: duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare //
S04bsu062_u:317_19: tasmāt svadhiṣṭhitaṃ cittam sadā kāryaṃ surakṣitam //
S04bsu062_u:317_28: naśyatvanyacca kauśalyaṃ mā tu cittaṃ na kasyacit //
S04bsu062_u:318_2: smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca sarvayatnena rakṣayet //
S04bsu062_u:318_4: tathābhyāṃ vyākulaṃ cittaṃ na kṣamaṃ bodhisādhane //
S04bsu062_u:318_21: saṃprajanyaṃ tadā yāti naiva yātyāgataṃ punaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:319_6: kathaṃ kāyaḥ sthita iti draṣṭavyaḥ punarantarā //
S04bsu062_u:319_8: dharmacitto mahāstambhe yathāa baddho na mucyate //
S04bsu062_u:319_9: kutra me vartata iti pratyavekṣyaṃ tathā manaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:319_15: evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ sarvamanyathā nobhayaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu062_u:319_23: anunītaṃ pratihataṃ yadā paśyet svakaṃ manaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:319_24: na kartavyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavattadā //
S04bsu062_u:319_26: sotprasātiśayaṃ vaktraṃ vaṃcakaṃ ca mano bhavet //
S04bsu062_u:320_2: upasthānārthi vā cittaṃ tadāa tiṣṭhecca kāṣṭhavat //
S04bsu062_u:320_15: cirāt kṣaṇavaraṃ prāptaṃ smṛtvā smṛtvā muhurmuhuḥ /
S04bsu062_u:320_23: sa śabdapātaṃ sahasā na piṭhādīn vikṣipet /
S04bsu062_u:321_5: sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sa cittairapi durlabhā /
S04bsu062_u:321_7: na cātrāpi vyayaḥ kaścit paratra ca mahatsukham /
S04bsu062_u:322_6: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeśacāpi garhitam //
S04bsu062_u:322_8: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhū mardayet samam //
S04bsu062_u:322_10: lokāprasāditaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṭvā pṛṭvā sa varjayet //
S04bsu062_u:322_19: rātriṃ divaṃ ca triskandhaṃ trikālaṃ ca pravartayet /
S04bsu062_u:322_21: yo avasthāḥ prapadyate svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
S04bsu062_u:322_22: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:322_23: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:322_24: na tadasti na yatpuṇyameva viharataḥ sataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:322_27: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvītārthe 'pi na tyajet //
S04bsu062_u:323_2: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate //
S04bsu062_u:323_6: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:323_8: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /
S04bsu062_u:323_9: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśasye hṛdi sthite //
S04bsu062_u:323_15: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca //
S04bsu062_u:323_18: naivaṃ dviṣaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvamapi ghnataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:323_19: krodhamekaṃ tu yo hanyāttena sarvadviṣo hatāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:323_23: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim //
S04bsu062_u:324_3: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhiḥ naiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
S04bsu062_u:324_4: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarupāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādanātra //
S04bsu062_u:324_17: evaṃ kṣamo bhavedvīryaṃ vīrye boddhiryataḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:324_18: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyu vinā gatiḥ //
S04bsu062_u:324_28: hatvā ripūn jayamanuttamamāpnuvanti visfurjitaṃ tadiha vīryaṃ mahābhaṭasya //
S04bsu062_u:325_7: yaddevā viyati vimānavāsino 'nye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
S04bsu062_u:325_12: karmāgamādyathā pūrvaṃ sajjaḥ sarvatra ca tu te //
S04bsu062_u:325_19: snehānna tyajyate loko lābhādiṣu ca tṛṣṇayā /
S04bsu062_u:325_22: śamathaḥ prathamaṃ gaveṣaṇīyaḥ sa ca loke nirapekṣayabhiratyā //
S04bsu062_u:325_24: yena janmasahastrāṇi draṣṭavyo na punaḥ priyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:325_25: apaśyannaratiṃ yāti samādhau na ca tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu062_u:325_26: na ca tṛpyati dṛṣṭvāpi pūrvavadbādhate tṛṣā //
S04bsu062_u:326_7: atha na śrūyate teṣāṃ kupitā yānti durgatim /
S04bsu062_u:326_21: bodhyaṃgadānaṃ pradiśantiṃ sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
S04bsu062_u:326_27: dhyānaṃ tatraikahetuṃ sakalaguṇanidhiṃ prāhuḥ sarve narendrāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:327_4: imaṃ parikaraṃ sarvaṃ prajñārthaṃ hi jagaddhite /
S04bsu062_u:327_12: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:327_16: prajñādhanena vikulaṃ tu narasya rupamālekhya rupamiva sāravihīnamantaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:327_17: buddhayānvitasya falamiṣṭamudeti vīryādvīryaṃ hi buddhirahitaṃ svavadhāya śatruḥ //
S04bsu062_u:327_19: madhyāntamādyapi janaḥ pravetti prajñābalaṃ tatkathayanti tajjñāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:327_21: jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadādoṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām //
S04bsu062_u:327_22: ādeṣṭā cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:327_24: kāryārṇave 'pi dṛḍhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:327_25: prajñāvaśātte vijayaṃ labhante prajñā hyataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:327_26: prajñābalenaiva jināḥ jayanti ghoraṃ suduṣṭaṃ ca mārasainyam /
S04bsu062_u:327_27: prajñāviśeṣeṇa janā vibhānti prajñā hi khyātā jananī jinānām //
S04bsu062_u:328_1: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhanabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍeva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
S04bsu062_u:328_2: jñātvā naraḥ svahitasādhanatatparaḥ syātkuryādataḥ satatamāśu dṛḍhaṃ prayatnam //
S04bsu062_u:328_20: teṣāmeva sadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvam /
S04bsu062_u:329_5: atha te sāṃghikāḥ sarve ānandapramukhāḥ mudā /
S04bsu062_u:329_16: jitvā māragaṇānarhan bodhiṃ prāpya jino bhaveḥ //
S04bsu062_u:329_17: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:332_0: atha bhūyaḥ sa rājendro bhūpo 'śokaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
S04bsu062_u:333_3: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditam /
S04bsu062_u:333_13: duḥkhāgnau patito yo 'pi smṛtvā lokeśvaraṃ bhajet /
S04bsu062_u:333_20: tataḥ sa sahasottīrya smṛtvā dharmarato bhavet //
S04bsu062_u:333_21: yadā ca vaṇijaḥ sārthā naukāruḍhā mahāmbudhau /
S04bsu062_u:333_25: tadā teṣāṃ mahādhīraḥ smṛtvā lokeśvaraṃ namet /
S04bsu062_u:333_27: tatastāḥ kālikā vātā na careyuḥ prasāditāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:333_28: tato nau savaṇiksārthā svasti ratnākaraṃ vrajet //
S04bsu062_u:334_1: tatra te vaṇijaḥ sarve labdharatnāḥ pramoditāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:334_2: svasti pratyāgatāḥ svasti samiyuḥ svapuraṃ laghu //
S04bsu062_u:334_5: yaśca duṣṭo vadhāt sṛṣṭo gṛhīto vadhyaghātakaiḥ /
S04bsu062_u:334_8: tataste ghātakāḥ sarve taṃ hantuṃ nābhiśaknuyuḥ //
S04bsu062_u:334_9: yadi vighātito daivāt tyaktvā pāpāśrayāṃ mṛtaḥ /
S04bsu062_u:334_11: sarve yakṣāśca gandharvāḥ kumbhāṇḍā rākṣasā api /
S04bsu062_u:334_12: kinnarā garuḍā nāgā bhūtāḥ pretāḥ piśācikāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:334_22: tadā te dhūrtakāścaurāḥ sarve yāyuḥ parāṅmukhāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:334_26: tadā sa vyādhito mukto nīrogī puṣṭitendriyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:335_4: tadā sa śrīguṇotpanno bhavet sāadhuḥ śubhendriyaḥ //
S04bsu062_u:335_16: tadā sa vijayan sarvān saṃsthāpayennije vaśe //
S04bsu062_u:335_21: yo 'putraḥ putraratnārthī taṃ lokeśaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
S04bsu062_u:335_27: vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ dhanārthi labhate dhanam /
S04bsu062_u:336_1: dravyārthī labhate dravyaṃ guṇārthī labhate guṇam /
S04bsu062_u:336_2: bhogyārthī labhate bhojyaṃ gṛhārthī labhate gṛham //
S04bsu062_u:336_13: yasya lokeśvare bhaktistasya pāpaṃ na kiṃcana /
S04bsu062_u:336_15: sarve duṣṭagaṇā mārāḥ kṣīyante sarvataḥ sadā /
S04bsu062_u:337_1: ye bhajanti sadā nityaṃ lokeśvaraṃ jagatprabhum /
S04bsu062_u:337_2: teṣāṃ naiva bhayaṃ kiṃcitsarvatra sarvadāpi hi //
S04bsu062_u:337_7: varuṇāśca hi rājāśca sarve vāyugaṇā api /
S04bsu062_u:337_8: sarve śrīdādayo yakṣāḥ sarve bhūtādhipā api //
S04bsu062_u:337_10: sarve siddhāśca sādhyāśca rudrā vidyādharā api //
S04bsu062_u:337_21: tathā ca yoginaḥ siddhā avikalpā jitendriyāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:337_26: vaiṣṇavā api śaivāśca liṃgino vratino 'pi ca //
S04bsu062_u:338_1: arhanto bhikṣavaścāpi dṛṣṭgā taṃ dūrato mudā /
S04bsu062_u:338_17: durgatiṃ te na gacchinta kadācana kathaṃcana /
S04bsu062_u:338_24: so 'pi na durgatiṃ yāti yāti sadgatimeva hi //
S04bsu062_u:339_22: bhāvayet satataṃ smṛtvā dhyātvāpi praṇayen mudā //
S04bsu062_u:340_4: sarvāḥ pāramitā devyaḥ sarve saṃghā jinātmajāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:340_22: matvā taṃ trijagannāthaṃ bhajasva sarvadā smaran //
S04bsu062_u:340_23: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā samāhitāḥ /
S04bsu062_u:340_24: nāmāpi ca samuccārya bhajanti śraddhayā sadā //
S04bsu062_u:340_26: kṛpādṛṣṭyā samālokya kṛtvā ceyuḥ śubhaṃ sadā //
S04bsu062_u:341_5: tataḥ prabhṛti rājā sa lokeśaṃ sarvadā smaran /
S04bsu062_u:341_6: dhyātvā nāma samuccārya prāabhajat pālayan prajāḥ //
S04bsu062_u:341_7: tadā tasya narendrasya viṣaye tatra sarvadā /
S04bsu062_u:341_15: eteṣāṃ tatra sarveṣāṃ saṃbuddhāḥ sakalāḥ sadā /
S04bsu062_u:341_22: tatra teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kurvantu maṃgalaṃ sadā //
S04bsu062_u:344_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu062_u:344_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodhaṃ evaṃvādī mahaśramaṇaḥ //
